name: Neverlose Your Burger
description:
Neverlose Your Burger was made for GameJam with theme "FOOD", me and my friends made an ONLINE FPS TOWERDEFENSE game in 5 days, We would like to share it with you guys to enjoy our beatiful game

People prefer to eat junkfood instead of healthy fruits and waste all those fruits. It makes them rotten that they want to have a revenge, Zombie Fruits are rising from the grave to destroy our Holy Burger. You as a player have to protect the Holy Burger from the Zombie Fruits. Holy Burger's fate is in your hand

7 types of enemy: 3 melees, 3 ranges, and boss

6 types of power up: 1 heal, 3 temp boost, 2 permanent boost

song by SoundImage.org
